EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_ Ensuring Cloud Native Success: Organization Transformation_Q415.
EmailTemplate.subject: Last chance to register: Ensuring Cloud Native Success: Organization Transformation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-organization-transformation]]> Thursday, April 7, 2016 10:00 AM GMT REGISTER NOW <[[http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-organization-transformation]]> Join us <[[http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-organization-transformation]]> tomorrow, April 7th for the last installment in our Ensuring Cloud Native Success series: Organization Transformation. To get the full benefit of a cloud native approach, you'll likely need to change how your organization functions and behaves: you'll have to change its culture.
When software is thought of as a series of ongoing products instead of discrete projects, the way the IT department is managed and run changes accordingly. Part 3 will cover the motivations for those changes and outlines how to start transforming everyday management, strategy, staffing, and operations to become a cloud native enterprise. Register now <[[http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-organization-transformation]]> to join Cot√© and team as they profile the third most common journey that our Pivotal Cloud Foundry customers undertake.
See you soon, The Pivotal Team
Be sure to check out <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/tag/cloud-native-journey]]> our blog series and other posts on the Cloud Native Journey.
